body:
As a rusher i like to think that this is essential to rushing but i wanted to know am i the only one that does this?
not clicking and dragging just pressing keys and keeping this organized example: sword/bow/pickaxe/gapples/fish/blocks)
i see vids of ppl rushing but i dont know how they can rush without doing this
https://youtu.be/KptyAp_czH4

replies.body:
As et said, the bow is my go to weapon. That's why it gets primary placement.
And having a bow and pick 1 slot away when I equip my sword is very efficient.  

The food is on the other end so I don't have to fumble about when scrolling to try and find it. It's just one small "scroll" from my bow, easy and quick.

replies.body: Well I guess it just goes by the players preference. xD I loved using the bow but every time that I would try it in first I would get rekted. Plus I didn't use the scroll wheel to select items just hotkeys on my mouse.

Yea, when I started putting the bow in first slot, I got rekt more than often but as I got used to it it was fine.
I'm so used to it now that if I have it the normal way with the bow in the second slot, I get smashed xD
